30 Days of Buffy: Day 6: Favourite Male Character

Not as easy for me as it was for Hazel.

When discussing this the other day with Hazel I said it was obviously going to be Giles and I even started to write this post with Giles in the top spot... but you know what - it's Oz, of course it's Oz - I wish he'd been around longer so I could have loved him some more...

Favourite Male Character: Oz - and here's a picture of why...



... and this is how cool he is in my head (with the help of Photoshop)
